messages.message:
hey are we going to introduce a Search In Document option. Currently you can only search the chat texts.

For context, I’m finding that I want to Fact Check the responses, so I’m searching in the PDF what the real content is. But I have to have it open in Preview App, which is cumbersome
we currently do not show the OCR text, but i think this is under consideration for future versions of AI Hub
+1 to searching document text. I just made the same discovery about search being limited to chat.
